abstract.t: Flow-based measurement is currently a popular method for various network monitoring usages. The sharing of flow-based information among orthogonal monitoring applications raises open issues in terms of scalability, reliability and flexibility that IPFIX Mediation may help resolve. IPFIX Mediation reroutes, replicates, filters, aggregates, correlates or modifies Flow Records or Packet Reports, or changes a transport protocol. This document describes the applicability of IPFIX Mediation and the problems that IPFIX Mediation might encounter.
